headline: AppLovin Refocuses On AI Ad Platform As Gaming Unit Is Sold
summary: AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) is divesting its core mobile gaming unit for $900 million. The company plans to focus exclusively on its advertising technology platform and AI-powered ad services. AppLovin is extending its AI-based ad tools into sectors such as e-commerce, fintech, and automotive. For you as an investor, this marks a clear shift in how AppLovin positions itself in the ad tech space. The business is moving from a mix of owned gaming titles and software tools toward a more focused...

headline: AppLovin's Explosive AdTech Growth At A Discount - Upgrade Buy
summary: AppLovin's selloff has highlighted the risks of chasing overpriced stocks at a time of exuberant AI market sentiments. Learn why APP stock is upgraded to buy.

headline: Jefferies Cuts AppLovin Corporation (APP)’s Price Target To $700 From $860, Keeps Buy Rating
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is among the 10 best meme stocks to buy now. On February 12, Jefferies cut its price target on the stock to $700 from $860, while maintaining a Buy rating. The adjustment came after the company announced its fourth-quarter financial results the day before. Ahead of the earnings call, analysts at Jefferies […]
